name: Destiny2_GetClanAggregateStats
description: Gets aggregated stats for a clan using the same categories as the clan leaderboards. PREVIEW: This endpoint is still in beta, and may experience rough edges. The schema is in final form, but there may be bugs that prevent desirable operation.

groupId.description: Group ID of the clan whose leaderboards you wish to fetch.

modes.description: List of game modes for which to get leaderboards. See the documentation for DestinyActivityModeType for valid values, and pass in string representation, comma delimited.
